ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities include multiple pull requests to add back volume control to the editor, fixing regressions introduced in a previous commit, and switching the scroll direction for beat snap to match stable versions.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities involve pull requests to update game modifier mods in Spanish, with two separate pull requests aimed at updating a total of 22 mods according to the osu-wiki status in Spanish, ensuring translations are up-to-date and reviewed.

ppy/osu-tools.summary: Recent activities include a push event and a pull request to add an option to populate score parameters on the SimulateScreen using a score ID, enhancing the tool's functionality with the merge of pull request #241.
